description.value:
You enhance your stability by replacing your legs with a quartet of spiderlike limbs. Basic X-legs grant you a +4 circumstance bonus to your KAC against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{bull rush}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#reposition]{reposition}, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#trip]{trip} combat maneuvers. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saving throws against effects that would knock you @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone}. Climbing X-legs include a gravitic-attraction device at the tip of each leg, allowing you to walk across walls and ceilings without using your hands; this grants you a climb speed of 25 feet.

An X-legs system uses similar connection points as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.15y3ktmm59l8LFIR]{standard prosthetic legs} (Core Rulebook 210), allowing you to detach your X-legs and attach a pair of prosthetic legs (which you must buy separately) in only 10 minutes, for situations where X-legs would attract unwanted attention.

Enable/Disable KAC bonus in the Modifiers tab.

modifiers.name: X-Legs, Basic
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saving throws against effects that would knock you Prone.
